class Sum2 extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.numA = React.createRef();//æŠŠçœŸå®domç»™äº†current
    this.numB = React.createRef();
    this.result = React.createRef();
  }
  componentDidMount() {
   
  }
  add = () => {
    let numA = this.numA.current.value;
    let numB = this.numB.current.value;
    let result = parseFloat(numA) + parseFloat(numB);
    this.result.current.value = result;
  }
  render() {
    return (
    <> 
    <input ref={this.numA}></input>+
    <input ref={this.numB}></input><button onClick={this.add}>ç­‰äº</button>
    <input ref={this.result}></input>
    </>
    )
  }
 
}

forwardRef

forwardRef åŸç†  ä¸­è½¬ç«™ è½¬å‘ref
function forwardRef(funComponent) {
    return function(props) { // ref:{current:null}
        return funComponent(props, props.ref1)
    }
}

class Form extends React.Component{
    //Formæƒ³æ“ä½œTextInput2 é‡Œé¢çš„input çš„dom
    constructor(props) {
        super(props);
        this.textInput = React.createRef();
    }
    getFocus = () => {
        this.textInput.current.focus();
    }
    render() {
        return (
            <>
            <TextInput2 ref={this.textInput} />
            <button onClick={this.getFocus}>focus</button>
            </>
        )
    }
}

let batchingStrategy = {
    isBatchingUpdates: false,//é»˜è®¤éæ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å¼
    dirtyComponents: [], //è„ç»„ä»¶ --- ç»„ä»¶çš„çŠ¶æ€å’Œç•Œé¢æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„ä¸ä¸€æ ·
    batchedUpdates() {
        this.dirtyComponents.forEach(component => {
            console.log(component, 'dirtyComponents');
            component.updateComponent()
        })
    }

}
//æ›´æ–°å™¨
class updater {
    constructor(component) {
        this.component = component;//ç»„ä»¶
        this.pendingStates = []; //æš‚å­˜ä¸´æ—¶çŠ¶æ€ ç¼“å­˜èµ·æ¥
    }
    addState(partcialState) {
        this.pendingStates.push(partcialState);
        //dirtyComponents è„ç»„ä»¶ --- ç»„ä»¶çš„çŠ¶æ€å’Œç•Œé¢æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„ä¸ä¸€æ ·
        batchingStrategy.isBatchingUpdates ? 
        batchingStrategy.dirtyComponents.push(this.component):
        this.component.updateComponent();
    }
}

    // component[method].call(event.target.component, event, method, ...others);

}
// batchingStrategy.isBatchingUpdates batchedUpdates
// ä¸€ä¸ªæ‰€è°“çš„äº‹åŠ¡å°±æ˜¯å°†éœ€è¦æ‰§è¡Œçš„methodä½¿ç”¨wrapper å°è£…èµ·æ¥ å†é€šè¿‡perform æ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œ
//å…ˆæ‰§è¡Œinitialize => methods => close
class Transaction {
    constructor(wrappers) {
        this.wrappers = wrappers;
    }
    perform(anyMethod) {
        this.wrappers.forEach(wrapper => wrapper.initialize());
        anyMethod.call();//åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•æ‰§è¡Œå‰ååšä¸€äº›äº‹æƒ…
        this.wrappers.forEach(wrapper => wrapper.close());
    }
}
let transaction = new Transaction([{
    initialize() {
        console.log('initialize')
        batchingStrategy.isBatchingUpdates = true;// å¼€å¯æ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å¼
    },
    close() {
        console.log('close')
        batchingStrategy.isBatchingUpdates = false;// å¼€å¯æ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–°æ¨¡å¼
        batchingStrategy.batchedUpdates();//è¿›è¡Œæ‰¹é‡æ›´æ–° æŠŠæ‰€æœ‰çš„è„ç»„ä»¶
    }
}])

react.js
class Component {
    static isReactComponent = true;
    constructor(props) {
        this.props = props;
    }
}

function ReactElement(type, props) {
    const element = {type, props};
    console.log('element--', element);
    return element;
}
function createElement(type, config = {}, children) {
    let propName;
    const props = {};
    for (propName in config) {
        props[propName] = config[propName];
    }
    props.children = Array.from(arguments).slice(2);
    return ReactElement(type, props);
}
export default {
    createElement,
    Component
}

react-dom.js
function render(element, parentNode) {
    console.log(element, parentNode)
    if (typeof element === 'string' || typeof element === 'number') {
        return parentNode.appendChild(document.createTextNode(element));
    }
    let type, props;
    type = element.type;
    props = element.props;
    // class Welcome1 extends React.Component {
    //     render() {
    //       return React.createElement('h1', {}, props.name, props.age)
    //     }
    //   }
    //å­ç±» Welcome1 ç»§æ‰¿äº†çˆ¶ç±»çš„isReactComponent
    if (type.isReactComponent) {
        //ç±»ç»„ä»¶
        let returnElement = new type(props).render();
        type = returnElement.type;//h1
        props = returnElement.props;
    } else if (typeof type === 'function') { //å‡½æ•°å¼ç»„ä»¶
        /**
         * function Welcome(props) {
          return React.createElement('h1', {}, props.name, props.age)
            }
           let element = React.createElement(Welcome, {name:'zhufeng', age:10});
         */

        let returnElement = type(props);//æŠŠpropsä¼ ç»™å‡½æ•°
        console.log('returnElement--', returnElement);
        type = returnElement.type;//
        props = returnElement.props;

    }
    let domElement = document.createElement(type);
    for (let propName in props) {
        console.log(propName, 'propName');
        if (propName === 'className') {
            domElement.className = props[propName];
        } else if (propName === 'style') {
            let styleObj = props[propName];
            // for (let attr in styleObj) {
            //     domElement.style[attr] = styleObj[attr];
            // }
            let cssText = Object.keys(styleObj).map(attr => {
                //æ­£åˆ™ æœ‰å¾…ç ”ç©¶ä¸€ä¸‹ä¸‹å“¦
                return `${attr.replace(/([A-Z])/g, function () { return '-' + arguments[1] })}: ${styleObj[attr]}`;
            });
            // domElement.style.cssText = 'color:red;font-size:50px';
            domElement.style.cssText = cssText;
        } else if (propName === 'children') {
            console.log(props.children, 'props.children');
            let children = Array.isArray(props.children) ? props.children : [props.children];
            children.forEach(child => render(child, domElement));
        } else {
            domElement.setAttribute(propName, props[propName])
        }
    }
    parentNode.appendChild(domElement);
}
export default {
    render
}

//æ ¹æ®æ–°çš„å±æ€§å¯¹è±¡æ´¾ç”ŸçŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡ æ–°çš„å±æ€§å¯¹è±¡ å’Œæ—§çš„çŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡
    //æŠŠprops æ˜ å°„ä¸ºstateçŠ¶æ€ prevState ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€ 
//getDerivedStateFromProps é™æ€æ–¹æ³•
    static getDerivedStateFromProps(nextProps, prevState) {
        //ä¼šè¿”å›æ–°çš„çŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡ æ›¿æ¢æ‰æ—§çš„çŠ¶æ€
        // return{date:Date.now()} // å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡this.stateæ‰¾åˆ°è¯¥å±æ€§
        if (nextProps.number%2===0) {
            return {number:prevState.number+nextProps.number*2}
        }else {
            return {number:prevState.number+nextProps.number*3}
        }
    }
// å®ƒçš„å«ä¹‰æ˜¯åœ¨Reactæ›´æ–°Domå…ƒç´ ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œè·å–ä¸€ä¸ªå¿«ç…§ï¼Œå®ƒè¿”å›çš„ç»“æœå°†ä½œä¸ºcomponentDidUpdateçš„ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•°ã€‚ä¸€èˆ¬çš„ç”¨æ³•å°±æ˜¯è·å–æ›´æ–°å‰çš„DOM
  getSnapshotBeforeUpdate() {
        //è¿”å›æ›´æ–°å‰çš„å†…å®¹é«˜åº¦ 
        return this.wrapper.current.scrollHeight; //ç»™ä¸‹é¢çš„prevScrollHeight
    }
 //ç»„ä»¶æ›´æ–°å®Œæ¯•
    componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, prevScrollHeight) {
        this.wrapper.current.scrollTop = 
        this.wrapper.current.scrollTop +(this.wrapper.current.scrollHeight -prevScrollHeight);
    }

getSnapshotBeforeUpdate

å‚è€ƒï¼šä¼˜ç§€https://segmentfault.com/a/1190000014456811?utm_source=channel-hottest

åœ¨æ›´æ–°ä¹‹å‰è¯»å–DOMå±æ€§

ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç»„ä»¶çš„ä¾‹å­ï¼Œå®ƒåœ¨æ›´æ–°ä¹‹å‰ä»DOMä¸­è¯»å–å±æ€§ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åœ¨åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­ä¿æŒæ»šåŠ¨ä½ç½®ï¼š

class ScrollingList extends React.Component {
  listRef = null;
  previousScrollOffset = null;

  componentWillUpdate(nextProps, nextState) {
    // Are we adding new items to the list?
    // Capture the scroll position so we can adjust scroll later.
    if (this.props.list.length < nextProps.list.length) {
      this.previousScrollOffset =
        this.listRef.scrollHeight - this.listRef.scrollTop;
    }
  }

  componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState) {
    // If previousScrollOffset is set, we've just added new items.
    // Adjust scroll so these new items don't push the old ones out of view.
    if (this.previousScrollOffset !== null) {
      this.listRef.scrollTop =
        this.listRef.scrollHeight -
        this.previousScrollOffset;
      this.previousScrollOffset = null;
    }
  }

  render() {
    return (
      `<div>`
        {/* ...contents... */}
      `</div>`
    );
  }

  setListRef = ref => {
    this.listRef = ref;
  };
}

åœ¨ä¸Šé¢çš„ä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼ŒcomponentWillUpdateè¢«ç”¨æ¥è¯»å–DOMå±æ€§ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œå¯¹äºå¼‚æ­¥æ¸²æŸ“ï¼Œâ€œrenderâ€é˜¶æ®µç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸï¼ˆå¦‚componentWillUpdateå’Œrenderï¼‰ä¸â€œcommitâ€é˜¶æ®µç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸï¼ˆå¦‚componentDidUpdateï¼‰ä¹‹é—´å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨å»¶è¿Ÿã€‚å¦‚æœç”¨æˆ·åœ¨è¿™æ®µæ—¶é—´å†…åšäº†ç±»ä¼¼è°ƒæ•´çª—å£å¤§å°çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œåˆ™ä»componentWillUpdateä¸­è¯»å–çš„scrollHeightå€¼å°†å¤±æ•ˆã€‚

è§£å†³æ­¤é—®é¢˜çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯ä½¿ç”¨æ–°çš„â€œcommitâ€é˜¶æ®µç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸgetSnapshotBeforeUpdateã€‚åœ¨æ•°æ®å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–ä¹‹å‰ç«‹å³è°ƒç”¨è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ï¼Œåœ¨æ›´æ–°DOMä¹‹å‰ï¼‰ã€‚å®ƒå¯ä»¥å°†Reactçš„å€¼ä½œä¸ºå‚æ•°ä¼ é€’ç»™componentDidUpdateï¼Œåœ¨æ•°æ®å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–åç«‹å³è°ƒç”¨å®ƒã€‚

è¿™ä¸¤ä¸ªç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå¯ä»¥åƒè¿™æ ·ä¸€èµ·ä½¿ç”¨ï¼š

class ScrollingList extends React.Component {
  listRef = null;

  getSnapshotBeforeUpdate(prevProps, prevState) {
    // Are we adding new items to the list?
    // Capture the scroll position so we can adjust scroll later.
    if (prevProps.list.length < this.props.list.length) {
      return (
        this.listRef.scrollHeight - this.listRef.scrollTop
      );
    }
    return null;
  }
 //
  componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) {
    // If we have a snapshot value, we've just added new items.
    // Adjust scroll so these new items don't push the old ones out of view.
    // (snapshot here is the value returned from getSnapshotBeforeUpdate)
    if (snapshot !== null) {
      this.listRef.scrollTop =
        this.listRef.scrollHeight - snapshot;
    }
  }

  render() {
    return (
      `<div>`
        {/* ...contents... */}
      `</div>`
    );
  }

  setListRef = ref => {
    this.listRef = ref;
  };
}

var REACT_CONTEXT_TYPE = Symbol.for('react.context');
var REACT_PROVIDER_TYPE = Symbol.for('react.provider');

function createContext() {
    class Provider extends Component{
        static value;
        $$typeof=REACT_PROVIDER_TYPE;
        constructor(props) {
            super(props);
            Provider.value = props.value;
            this.state = {value:props.value}
        }
        //æ˜ å°„ä¸ºæ–°çš„çŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡
       static getDerivedStateFromProps(props, state) {
        Provider.value = props.value;
            return {value:props.props}
        }
        render() {
            return this.props.children;
        }
    }
    class Consumer extends Component{
        render() {
            return this.props.children(Provider.value);
        }
    }
    return {$$typeof:REACT_CONTEXT_TYPE,Provider,Consumer}
}

export default class PureComponent extends Component {
    isPureComponent = true;
    //ä¼ å…¥æ–°çš„å±æ€§å¯¹è±¡å’ŒçŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡ ç„¶åè¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦æ›´æ–°çš„booleanå€¼
    shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState) {
        //ç›¸ç­‰å°±ä¸ç”¨æ¸²æŸ“
        return !shallowEqual(this.props, nextProps) || !shallowEqual(this.state, nextState);
    }
    render() {
        return (
            <div>
                
            </div>
        )
    }
}
//æºç å°±æ˜¯æµ…æ¯”è¾ƒ
//æµ…æ¯”è¾ƒ  åªæ¯”è¾ƒä¸€å±‚ obj1 å’Œ obj2æ˜¯å¦ç›¸ç­‰ ç›¸ç­‰è¿”å›trueå¦åˆ™false,åªæ¯”è¾ƒç¬¬ä¸€å±‚
//ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå¼•ç”¨åœ°å€  å°±ä¸ç›¸ç­‰
function shallowEqual(obj1, obj2) {
    if (obj1 === obj2) {
        return true;//æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå†…å­˜åœ°å€
    }
   //çœ‹æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯å¯¹è±¡ æˆ–è€… null ç›´æ¥è¿”å›falseä¸ç›¸ç­‰
    if (typeof obj1 !=='object' || obj1 === null || typeof obj2 !=='object' || obj2 === null) {
        return false
    }
    let keys1 =Object.keys(obj1);
    let keys2 =Object.keys(obj2);
  //å¦‚æœé•¿åº¦ä¸ç›¸ç­‰ è‚¯å®šå°±ä¸ç›¸ç­‰
    if (keys1.length !==keys2.length) {
        return false
    }
    for(let key of keys1) {
       //å¦‚æœobj2æ²¡æœ‰obj1çš„å±æ€§  æˆ–è€…æœ‰ ä½†æ˜¯è·Ÿobj1 ä¸ç›¸ç­‰ è¿˜æ˜¯flase
        if (!obj2.hasOwnProperty(key) || obj1[key]!=obj2[key]) {
            return false
        }
    }
    return true;

}

        render() {
            console.log(this, this.props)
            return <FuncComponent {...this.props}/>

        }
    }

export default class MouseTracker extends Component {
    constructor() {
        super();
        this.state = { x: 0, y: 0 };
    }
    handleMouseMove = (event) => {
        this.setState({
            x: event.clientX,
            y: event.clientY
        })
    }
    render() {
        return (
            <div onMouseMove={this.handleMouseMove}>
            {this.props.children({x:this.state.x, y: this.state.y})}
            //å¦‚æœæ˜¯renderçš„è¯
             {this.props.render({x:this.state.x, y: this.state.y})}
            </div>
        )
    }
}

class ErrorBoundary extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = { hasError: false };
  }

  static getDerivedStateFromError(error) {
    // æ›´æ–° state ä½¿ä¸‹ä¸€æ¬¡æ¸²æŸ“èƒ½å¤Ÿæ˜¾ç¤ºé™çº§åçš„ UI
    return { hasError: true };
  }

  componentDidCatch(error, errorInfo) {
    // ä½ åŒæ ·å¯ä»¥å°†é”™è¯¯æ—¥å¿—ä¸ŠæŠ¥ç»™æœåŠ¡å™¨
    logErrorToMyService(error, errorInfo);
  }

  render() {
    if (this.state.hasError) {
      // ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰é™çº§åçš„ UI å¹¶æ¸²æŸ“
      return <h1>Something went wrong.</h1>;
    }

    return this.props.children; 
  }
}

export default function isPlainObject(obj) {
    if (typeof obj != 'object' || obj === null) {
        return false;
    }
    let proto = obj;
    while(Object.getPrototypeOf(proto)) {
        proto = Object.getPrototypeOf(proto);
    }
    return Object.getPrototypeOf(obj) === proto;
}
//actionTypes
const ActionType = {
    INIT: '@@redux/INIT'
}
export default ActionType;

createStore.js
import isPlainObject from './utils/isPlainObject'
import actionTypes from './utils/actionTypes'

export default function createStore(reducer, preloadedState) {
    if(typeof reducer !== 'function') {
        return new Error('reducerå¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°')
    }
    let currentReducer = reducer;//å½“å‰çš„å¤„ç†å™¨
    let currentState = preloadedState; //å½“å‰çŠ¶æ€
    let currentListeners = [];//ä¿å­˜å½“å‰çš„ç›‘å¬å‡½æ•°
    function getState() {
        return currentState;
    }
    function dispatch(action) {
        if(!isPlainObject(action)) {
            throw new Error('actionå¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªçº¯å¯¹è±¡')
        }
        if (typeof action.type === 'undefined') {
            throw new Error('actionçš„typeçš„å±æ€§ä¸èƒ½æ˜¯undefined');
        }
        currentState = currentReducer(currentState, action);
        //çŠ¶æ€å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–  é€šçŸ¥
        for (let i = 0; i < currentListeners.length;i++) {
            const listener = currentListeners[i];
            listener();
        }
        return action;
    }
    //è®¢é˜…
    function subscribe(listener) {
        currentListeners.push(listener);
        //æºç ä¼˜åŒ–  let 
        let subscribed = true;
      //å–æ¶ˆè®¢é˜…
        return function unsubscribe() {
            if (!subscribed) return;
            const index = currentListeners.indexOf(listener);
            console.log(index, currentListeners);
            currentListeners.splice(index, 1);
            subscribed = false;
        }
    }
    //å¦‚æœstateæ˜¯é€šè¿‡reducerä¼ è¿‡æ¥çš„  æ²¡æ³•æ‹¿åˆ°åˆå§‹åŒ–çŠ¶æ€ å¿…é¡»åšä»¥ä¸‹å¤„ç†
    dispatch({type:actionTypes});////preloadedState å¯èƒ½æ²¡æœ‰ä¼ 
    return {
        getState,
        subscribe,
        dispatch
    }
}

bindActionCreator

function bindActionCreator(actionCreator, dispatch) {
    return function() {
     return dispatch(actionCreator.apply(this,arguments));
    }
 }
 export default function bindActionCreators(actionCreators, dispatch) {
     if (typeof actionCreators === 'function') {
         return bindActionCreator(actionCreators, dispatch);
     }
     //ä¼ çš„æ˜¯æ•´ä¸ªactionå¯¹è±¡
     const bindActionCreators = {};
     for(const key in actionCreators) {
         //æŠŠæ¯ä¸ªé”®å€¼é‡å†™æˆ æ–¹æ³• ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨ æ›¿æ¢æ‰è€æ–¹æ³•
         bindActionCreators[key] = bindActionCreator(actionCreators[key], dispatch);
     }
     return bindActionCreators;
 }
//  actionCreators = {
//      increment() {
//          return types.INCREMENT
//      }
//  }
//  bindActionCreatorsçš„ä½œç”¨æ˜¯å°†ä¸€ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªactionå’Œdispatchç»„åˆèµ·æ¥ç”Ÿæˆ

combineReducers

//åˆå¹¶reducers

export default function (reducers) {
    //å®ç°reducerçš„åˆå¹¶
    //reducers {counter1:counter1, counter2:counter2}
    const reducerKeys = Object.keys(reducers);//['counter1', 'counter2']
    return function (state = {}, action) {

        //è¿™é‡Œåº”è¯¥æ˜¯ç»™ åˆå¹¶æˆæ–°çš„reducer  reducer éœ€è¦ä¼ å‚
        const nextState = {};//ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªçŠ¶æ€å¯¹è±¡
        for (let i = 0; i < reducerKeys.length; i++) {
            const key = reducerKeys[i];//counter1
            const reducer = reducers[key];
            const previouStateForKey = state[key]; //è€çŠ¶æ€
            const nextStateForKey = reducer(previouStateForKey, action);
            nextState[key] = nextStateForKey;
        }
        return nextState;
    }

}
import {combineReducers} from '../../redux';
let reducers = combineReducers({
    counter1,
    counter2
})
export default reducers;
reducer --- counter1.js
import * as types from '../action-types';
let initState = { number: 1 };
function reducer(state = initState, action) {
    console.log(action, 'action');
    switch (action.type) {
        case types.INCREMENT:
            return { number: state.number + (action.payload ?                         action.payload.number : 1) }
        case types.DECREMENT:
            return { number: state.number - 1 }
        default:
            return state;

    }
}
export default reducer;

//ç”¨äºè¿æ¥ä»“åº“è·Ÿç»„ä»¶ ç›®çš„æ˜¯æŠŠçŠ¶æ€æ˜ å°„ä¸ºstate
import React,{Component} from 'react';
import {bindActionCreators} from '../redux'
import ReduxContext from './context'
//mapStateToProps  æŠŠçŠ¶æ€æ ‘æ˜ å°„ä¸ºprops
export default function(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps) {
    return function(WrapperComponent) {
        return class extends Component{
            static contextType = ReduxContext;//æ‹¿åˆ°ä¸Šä¸‹é—®å¯¹è±¡
            constructor(props, context) { //context = {store: this.props.store}
            console.log(props, context);
                super(props);
                this.state = mapStateToProps(context.store.getState());
            }
            componentDidMount() {
                this.unsubscribe = this.context.store.subscribe(() => {
                    this.setState(mapStateToProps(this.context.store.getState()));
                })
            }
            componentWillUnmount() {
                this.unsubscribe();
            }
            render() {
                let actions = {};
                if (typeof mapDispatchToProps == 'function') {
                    actions = mapDispatchToProps(this.context.store.dispatch);

                }else {
                   //bindActionCreators æ´¾å‘åŠ¨ä½œ
                    actions = bindActionCreators(mapDispatchToProps, this.context.store.dispatch);

                }
                return <WrapperComponent {...this.state} {...actions}></WrapperComponent>
            }
            
        }
    }
}

Compose

compose.js
function add1(str) {
    return '1'+str;
}
function add2(str) {
    return '2'+str;
}
function add3(str) {
    return '3'+str;
}
function compose(...funcs) {
    if (funcs.length === 0) return args => args;
    if (funcs.length ===1) {
        return funcs[0];
    }
    return funcs.reduce((func, next)=>(...args) => func(next(...args)));
}
let result = compose(add1)('zhufeng');
console.log(result, 'result------'); 
export default compose;

redux-applyMiddleware

import compose from './compose'
export default function applyMiddleware(...middleware) {
    return function(createStore) {
        return function(reducers) {
            const store = createStore(reducers);//æœ€åŸå§‹ çš„ä»“åº“
            let dispatch = () => {
                throw Error('ç°åœ¨è¿˜ä¸èƒ½ç”¨');
            }
            // middleware = middleware(store);
            let middlewareAPI  = {
                getState: store.getState,
                dispatch: (...args) => dispatch(...args)
            }
            const chain = middleware.map(middleware => middleware(middlewareAPI)); //ä¸­é—´ä»¶ç”¨æ³•
          //
            console.log(chain, 'chain---');
            // dispatch = middleware(store.dispatch);
            dispatch = compose(...chain)(store.dispatch);
            return {
                ...store,
                dispatch
            }
        }
    }
}

Redux-thunk.js

å®ç°æ´¾å‘ä¸€ä¸ªå¼‚æ­¥

function createThunkMiddleWare(extraArgument) {
    console.log(extraArgument, 'extraArgument');
     // let middlewareAPI  = {
    //     getState: store.getState,
    //     dispatch: (...args) => dispatch(...args)
    // }
    // const chain = middleware.map(middleware => middleware(middlewareAPI));
   
    // dispatch = compose(...chain)(store.dispatch);
    return ({dispatch, getState}) => next => action => {
        if (typeof action === 'function') {
            console.log(action, 'actions----')
           return action(dispatch, getState, extraArgument);
        }
        return next(action);
    }
}
const thunk = createThunkMiddleWare();
thunk.withExtraArgument = createThunkMiddleWare;
export default  thunk;

Redux-promise.js
function isPromise(obj) {
    //åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªpromise åˆ¤æ–­.thenå±æ€§æ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªfunction
    return !!obj && (typeof obj == 'object' || typeof obj == 'function') && (typeof obj.then == 'function')
}
export default function({dispatch,getState}) {
    return next => action => {
        return isPromise(action.payload) ? action.payload.then(result => {
           dispatch({...action, payload: result});
        }).catch((error) => {
            dispatch({...action, payload:error, error:true});
            //å¿…é¡»return ä¸€ä¸ªå¤±è´¥
            return Promise.reject(error); //å› ä¸ºactionè¿˜è¦å‘ä¸‹ä¼ é€’ ä¿è¯èµ°åˆ°å¤±è´¥ let {payload} =store.dispatch(action);
         // payload.then
        }): next(action);
    }
}

    function push(to) {
        //ä¸‰ä¸ªå‚æ•° state æ ‡é¢˜ï¼ˆå·²ç»åºŸå¼ƒï¼‰ 
        //pushState å…¥æ ˆä¸ä¼šè§¦å‘onpopstate

    }

        container.innerHTML = state.to || path;

    }
    //é‡å†™
    let oldPush = window.history.pushState;
    window.history.pushState = function(state, title, path) {
        // console.log(state);
        oldPush.call(window.history,state, title, path);
        window.onpushState(state, title, path); 
    }

HashRouter

import React, { Component } from 'react'
import Context from './context'
export default class HashRouter extends Component {
    state = {
        location:{pathname:window.location.hash.slice(1) || '/', state:null}
    }
    componentDidMount() {
        window.location.hash = window.location.hash || '/';
        window.addEventListener('hashchange', (e) => {
            //locationå¯¹è±¡  é‡Œæœ‰çš„å‚æ•°
            this.setState({
                location: {
                    ...this.state.location,
                    pathname:window.location.hash.slice(1),
                    state: this.locationState
                }
            })
        })
    }
    locationState = null;//ç§æœ‰å±æ€§
    render() {
        let that =this;
        //ä¼ ç»™route
        let value = {
            location:that.state.location,
            history:{
                push(to) { //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªhistoryå¯¹è±¡  æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªpushæ–¹æ³•æ¥è·³è½¬è·¯å¾„
                    // message = {location => }
                    //that.block = message
                   if (that.message) {
                       let confirm =  window.confirm(that.message(typeof to === 'object' ? to : {pathname:to}));
                       if (!confirm) return;
                   }
                  
                    if (typeof to === 'object') {
                       let {pathname, state} = to;
                       that.locationState = state; 
                   window.location.hash = pathname; //è§¦å‘hashchange
                //    console.log(path, window.location.hash)
                   }else {
                    that.locationState = null; 
                    window.location.hash = to; //è§¦å‘hashchange
                   }
                },
                block(message) {
                    console.log('block-message', message);
                    that.message = message; //æš‚å­˜ è¿™æ˜¯ç»„ä»¶ä¼ è¿‡æ¥çš„message
                }
            }
        }
        return (
            <div>
                <Context.Provider value={value}>
                    {this.props.children}
                </Context.Provider>
            </div>
        )
    }
}

BrowserRouter

import React, { Component } from 'react'
import Context from './context'
let pushState = window.history.pushState;

export default class BrowserRouter extends Component {
    state = {
        location:{pathname:window.location.pathname, state:null}
    }
    componentDidMount() {
        console.log(window)
        const that = this;
      //é‡å†™historyçš„pushState
        window.history.pushState = (state, title, url) => {
            console.log('window.history.pushState', state, title, url);
            pushState.call(window.history,state, title, url);
            window.onpushstate.call(that, state, url);
        }
        window.onpopstate = (event) => {
            console.log(event, 'window-event--onpopstate')
            that.setState({
                location: {
                    ...that.state.location,
                    pathname:window.location.pathname,
                    state: event.state
                }
            })
        }
        window.onpushstate = (state, pathname) => {
            console.log('window-event--onpushstate')
            that.setState({
                location: {
                    ...that.state.location,
                    pathname,
                    state
                }
            })
        }
    }
    render() {
        let that =this;
        let value = {
            location:that.state.location,
            history:{
                push(to) { //å®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªhistoryå¯¹è±¡  æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªpushæ–¹æ³•æ¥è·³è½¬è·¯å¾„
                    // message = {location => }
                    //that.block = message
                   if (that.block) {
                       let confirm =  window.confirm(that.block(typeof to === 'object' ? to : {pathname:to}));
                       if (!confirm) return;
                   }
                  
                    if (typeof to === 'object') {
                       let {pathname, state} = to;
                       //çŠ¶æ€  æ ‡é¢˜  è·¯å¾„ pushState(stateObject,title,URL):
                       window.history.pushState(state, '', pathname);
                   }else {
                    // window.location.hash = to; //è§¦å‘hashchange
                    window.history.pushState(null, '', to);
                   }
                },
                block(message) {
                    console.log('block-message', message);
                    that.block = message;
                }
            }
        }
        return (
            <div>
                <Context.Provider value={value}>
                    {this.props.children}
                </Context.Provider>
            </div>
        )
    }
}

route

æ¥æ”¶pathname åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¾ç¤ºç»„ä»¶

æ¸²æŸ“æœ‰ä¸‰ç§æ–¹å¼ component render children

component render åªæœ‰è·¯å¾„åŒ¹é…äº†æ‰ä¼šæ¸²æŸ“ å¦åˆ™ä¸æ¸²æŸ“

childrenä¸ç®¡è·¯å¾„åŒ¹é…ä¸åŒ¹é…éƒ½ä¼šæ¸²æŸ“ ä½†æ˜¯è¦çœ‹match æœ‰æ²¡æœ‰å€¼ æœ‰å€¼çš„è¯åŒ¹é…ä¸Šäº† å¯ä»¥ç»™å½“å‰è·¯ç”±åŠ ä¸ªé¢œè‰²

import React, { Component, Children } from 'react'
import Context from './context'
import { pathToRegexp } from 'path-to-regexp';
//åŒ¹é…è·¯ç”±æ¸²æŸ“  ç»„ä»¶
export default class Route extends Component {
    static contextType = Context;
    render() {
        let { pathname } = this.context.location;
        console.log(pathname, 'pathname');
        let { path = '/', component: Component, exact = false, render, children } = this.props;
        let paramNames = []; 
        let regexp = pathToRegexp(path, paramNames, { end: exact });
        let result = pathname.match(regexp);
        /** result æ²¡æœ‰åŠ¨æ€è·¯ç”±çš„æ—¶å€™  paramNamesæ˜¯ä¸ªã€ã€‘
         * ["/user/detail/1597158679806", "1597158679806", index: 0, input: "/user/detail/1597158679806", groups: undefined]
            0: "/user/detail/1597158679806"
            1: "1597158679806" //åŠ¨æ€è·¯ç”±çš„æ—¶å€™æœ‰
            groups: undefined
            index: 0
            input: "/user/detail/1597158679806"
            length: 2
         */
        /**  result çš„å€¼ æœ‰åŠ¨æ€è·¯ç”± 
         * ["/", index: 0, input: "/user/detail/1597158679806", groups: undefined]
        0: "/"
        groups: undefined
        index: 0
        input: "/user/detail/1597158679806"
        length: 1
        __proto__: Array(0)
         */
        /**
         *  paramNames--- æ•°ç»„å¯¹è±¡--è¿™ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å¯ä»¥æ‹¿åˆ°ä¼ çš„åŠ¨æ€è·¯ç”±çš„key
            [{â€¦}]
            0: 
            modifier: ""
            name: "id"
            pattern: "[^\/#\?]+?"
            prefix: "/"
            suffix: ""
            __proto__: Objectlength: 1__proto__: Array(0) 
         */
        let props = {
            location: this.context.location,
            history: this.context.history
        } // ä¼ ç»™ç»„ä»¶
        if (result) {
            paramNames = paramNames.map(item => item.name);// ['id']
            let [url, ...values] = result; // resultç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°æ˜¯url
            let params = {};
            for (let i = 0; i < paramNames.length; i++) {
                params[paramNames[i]] = values[i]
            }
            // paramNames
            /**
             * :
              modifier: ""
              name: "id"
              pattern: "[^\/#\?]+?"
              prefix: "/"
              suffix: ""
             */
            props.match = {
                params,
                path,
                url,
                isExact: url === pathname,
            }
            if (Component) {
                return <Component {...props}></Component>
            } else if (render) { 
                return render(props);
            }else if(children){
                return children(props);
            }else {
                return null;
            }
        }
        if (children) {
            return children(props)
        }
        return null; // å¿…é¡»æ˜¯return null
    }
}

import React, { Component } from 'react'
import RouterContext from './context'
export default class Link extends Component {
    static contextType = RouterContext;
    render() {
        // console.log(this.context, 'link-context');
        return (
        // <a href={`#${this,props.to}`}>{this.props.children}</a>
        <a {...this.props} onClick={() => this.context.history.push(this.props.to)}>{this.props.children}</a>
        )
    }
}

Switch.js
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import RouterContext from './context'
import {pathToRegexp} from 'path-to-regexp'
//åŒ¹é…è·¯ç”±  route path component
export default class Switch extends Component {
    static contextType = RouterContext;
    render() {
        let { pathname } = this.context.location;//å½“å‰åœ°å€æ çš„è·¯å¾„
        let children = Array.isArray(this.props.children) ? this.props.children : [this.props.children];
        console.log(children, 'children')
        
        for(let i = 0; i < children.length;i++) {
            let child = children[i];
            let {path='/', exact=false} = child.props;
            let paramNames = [];
            let regexp = pathToRegexp(path, paramNames,{end:exact});
            let result = pathname.match(regexp);
            if (result) {
                return child;//child æ˜¯ä¸ªå•¥  reactå…ƒç´ 
            }
        }
        return null;
    }
}

Prompt

 <Prompt when={this.state.blocking} message={location=> `ä½ ç¡®å®šè¦è·³è½¬åˆ°${location.pathname}`}></Prompt>
//åœ¨routerè·³è½¬é˜»æ­¢ HashRouter
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import RouterContext from './context'
export default class Prompt extends Component {
    static contextType = RouterContext;
    componentWillMount() {
        this.context.history.block(null)
    }
    render() {
        let history = this.context.history;//ä»ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­è·å–å†å²å¯¹è±¡
        const {when, message} = this.props;
        if (when) {
            history.block(message);
        }else {
            history.block(null);
        }
        return null;
    }
}

3.å…¥å£æ–‡ä»¶-indexjs

step3  ---æ ¹index.js
Wrap your react-router v4/v5 routing with ConnectedRouter and pass the history object as a prop. Remember to delete any usage of BrowserRouter or NativeRouter as leaving this in will cause problems synchronising the state.
Place ConnectedRouter as a child of react-redux's Provider.
N.B. If doing server-side rendering, you should still use the StaticRouter from react-router on the server.
import React from 'react';
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';
import Home from './components/Home'
import Counter from './components/counter'
import { Route, Link } from 'react-router-dom'
import { Provider } from 'react-redux'
import { store, persistor } from './store'

export default function(path) {
    console.log(path, 'push-push')

        type: CALL_HISTORY_METHOD,
         payload: {
             method:'push',

routerMiddleware
routerMiddleware.js
import {CALL_HISTORY_METHOD} from './constants'
export default function(history) {
    return ({dispatch, getState}) => next => action => {
        if (action.type === CALL_HISTORY_METHOD) {
            let {method, path} = action.payload;
            history[method](path)
        }else {
            next(action)
        }
    }
}

connected-router
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import {Router} from 'react-router'//react-router-domæ˜¯æµè§ˆå™¨ç«¯çš„router
import {LOCATION_CHANGE} from './constants'
import { ReactReduxContext } from 'react-redux'
//react-router-dom æ˜¯æµè§ˆå™¨ç«¯çš„Router
//hashrouter å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ‹¥æœ‰äº†hashhistory çš„reactrouter 
export default class ConnectedRouter extends Component {
    static contextType = ReactReduxContext;
    componentDidMount() {
        //ç›‘å¬è·¯å¾„çš„å˜åŒ– æ¯å½“è·¯å¾„å‘ç”Ÿå˜åŒ–å éƒ½ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œç›‘å¬å‡½æ•° å¹¶ä¼ å…¥ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªå‚æ•°æ–°çš„è·¯å¾„æ–°çš„åŠ¨ä½œ
        //action 'push' 'pop'
        this.unlistener = this.props.history.listen((location, action) => {
            this.context.store.dispatch({
                type: LOCATION_CHANGE,
                payload:{location, action}
                //location  action =â€˜popâ€™ || 'push'
         }
            })
        })
    }
    componentWillUnmount() {
        this.unlistener();
    }
    render() {
        let {history, children} = this.props;
        return (
            <Router history={history}>
                {children}
            </Router>
        )
    }
}
//å¤šäº†ä¸ªç›‘å¬çš„åŠŸèƒ½

redux-persist-persistStore.js
const PERSIST_INIT = 'PERSIST_INIT';

export default function persistStore(store) {
    let persistor = {
        ...store,
        initState() {
            store.dispatch({ type: PERSIST_INIT })
        }
    }
    return persistor
}

export default function persistStore(store) {
    let persistor = {

        }

redux-persist-persistReducer

æŠŠlocalstorageçš„æ•°æ®ç»™reducer state

const PERSIST_INIT = 'PERSIST_INIT';

//persistedReducer = persistReducer(persistConfig, reducers)
export default function persistReducer(persistConfig, reducers) {
    let key = `persist:${persistConfig.key}`;
    let isInited =false;
    return function (state, action) {
        switch (action.type) {
            case PERSIST_INIT:
                isInited = true;
                let value = persistConfig.storage.get(key);
                state = JSON.parse(value);
                return state;
            default:
                console.log(isInited, 'isInited');
                if (isInited) {
                    state = reducers(state, action);
                    persistConfig.storage.set(key, JSON.stringify(state));
                    return state;
                }else {
                    console.log(reducers(state, action), 'reducers(state, action)')
                    return reducers(state, action);
                }
               
        }
    }
}
redux-persist/lib/storage
export default {
    set(key, value) {
        localStorage.setItem(key, value);
    },
    get(key) {
        return localStorage.getItem(key);
    }
}

// delayå¤§æ¦‚æ„æ€
export const delay = function(ms) {
    return new Promise((reslove, reject) => {
        setTimeout(()=> {
            console.log(this) //null
            reslove(this.username);
        }, ms)
    })
}
export function* incrementAsync() {
    //å½“ä½ yield ä¸€ä¸ªpromiseçš„æ—¶å€™ sagaä¸­é—´ä»¶å¯ä»¥æ¥å—è¿™ä¸ªpromise ä¼šç­‰å¾…å®Œæˆ
    //å®Œæˆåä¼šæŠŠè¿™ä¸ªresolveçš„å€¼èµ‹ç»™msg å†æ¥ç€å¾€ä¸‹èµ°

    // let msg = yield call(delay, 100); //callå°±æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°
    console.log('msg', msg);
    yield put({type:types.INCREMENT})
}
export function* watchIncrementAsync() {
    console.log('hello saga-async');
    //ç›‘å¬æ¯ä¸€æ¬¡çš„ASYNC_INCREMENT æ¯å½“æœ‰äººå‘ä»“åº“æ´¾å‘è¿™ä¸ªåŠ¨ä½œçš„æ—¶å€™ å°±ä¼šè°ƒç”¨å¦ä¸€ä¸ªworker saga

Action-types.js


export const LOGIN = 'LOGIN';
export const LOGIN_ERROR = 'LOGIN_ERROR';
export const LOGIN_SUCESS = 'LOGIN_SUCESS';

export const LOGIN_OUT = 'LOGIN_OUT';
export const LOGIN_OUT_SUCCESS = 'LOGIN_OUT_SUCCESS'

Src-components-login.js

import * as types from '../action-types'
export default {
    login(username, password) {
        return {
            type:types.LOGIN,
            payload:{username, password}
        }
    },
    logout() {
        return {
            type: types.LOGIN_OUT
        }
    }
}

Store-reducer-user.js

import * as types from '../action-types'
let ininstate = { username: null }
export default function (state = ininstate, action) {
    switch (action.type) {
        case types.LOGIN_SUCESS:
            return { token: action.payload }
        case types.LOGIN_ERROR:
            return { error: action.error }
        case types.LOGIN_OUT_SUCCESS:
            return {}
        default:
            return state;
    }
}

Saga-loginsaga

take, put, call, fork, cancel, cancelled

import { take, put, call, fork, cancel, cancelled } from 'redux-saga/effects'; //è¿™ä¸ªåº“é‡Œæœ‰delay
import * as types from '../action-types'
import api from './api'
function* login(username, password) {
    try {
        api.setItem('loading', 'true');
        //api.loginæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªpromise
        const token = yield call(api.login, username, password);
        yield put({ type: types.LOGIN_SUCESS, payload: token });
        api.setItem('loading', 'false');
    } catch (error) {
        alert(error);
        api.setItem('loading', 'false');
        yield put({ type: types.LOGIN_ERROR, error })
    }finally{
        //ä¸ç®¡æˆåŠŸè¿˜æ˜¯å¤±è´¥
        if (yield cancelled()) {
            api.setItem('loading', 'false');
        }
    }
}
export default function* () {
    while (true) {
        let { payload: { username, password } } = yield take(types.LOGIN);
        //å¦‚æœæ¥å£å¾ˆæ…¢ => ç­‰ä¸åŠäº† å°±ç‚¹å‡»é€€å‡º å°±ç›‘å¬ä¸åˆ°äº† æ°¸è¿œæ˜¯ç™»å½•çŠ¶æ€ 
        //ä¸å¸Œæœ› é˜»å¡æ“ä½œ é€€å‡ºç™»å½•
        // const token = yield call(login, username, password);
        //fork å°±ç›¸å½“äºå¼€å¯äº†ä¸€ä¸ªå­è¿›ç¨‹ ä»–ä¼šå•ç‹¬å»æ‰§è¡Œ 
        // ä¸ä¼šå½±å“å½“å‰çš„ä¸»è¿›ç¨‹æ‰§è¡Œï¼Œä¸»è¿›ç¨‹ä¼šç«‹åˆ»å‘ä¸‹æ‰§è¡Œ  è¿™æ˜¯æ‰“ä¸ªæ¯”æ–¹å“Ÿ  åé¢çœ‹æºç å®ç°
        //æˆ‘ä»¬æ‹¿ä¸åˆ°loginçš„è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡å¯¹è±¡
       const task = yield fork(login, username, password); //æˆ‘ä»¬æ‹¿ä¸åˆ°loginæ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼ ä½†æ˜¯å¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°ä¸€ä¸ªä»»åŠ¡å¯¹è±¡çš„è¿”å›å€¼
        // if (token) {
            //ä¸€æ—¦ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸäº† å°±å¯ä»¥å¼€å§‹ç›‘å¬é€€å‡ºçš„åŠ¨ä½œ
           const action =  yield take(types.LOGIN_OUT);
           if (action.type === types.LOGIN_OUT) {
               yield cancel(task);
           }
            yield put({ type: types.LOGIN_OUT_SUCCESS });
        // }
    }
}

import {take, put, takeEvery, call, cps, all, fork, delay, cancel} from '../../redux-saga/effects'
import * as types from '../action-types'
function* increment () {
    while(true) {
        yield delay(1000);
        yield put({type:types.INCREMENT});
    }
}


export default function* () {
    const task = yield fork(increment);
    yield take(types.STOP_INCREMENT);
    yield cancel(task);
}

redux-saga-effect.js


export function take(actionType) {
    // console.log('effect-take', actionType);
    return {
        type:'TAKE',
        actionType
    }
}
export function put(action) {
    // console.log('effect-put', action);
    return {
        type:'PUT',
        action
    }
}
export function fork(task) {
    return {
        type: 'FORK',
        task
    }
}
//takeevery ç›¸å½“äºè¦å¼€å¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å­è¿›ç¨‹ï¼Œå•ç‹¬ç›‘å¬actionType,å½“åŠ¨ä½œå‘ç”Ÿçš„æ—¶å€™å»æ‰§è¡Œè¿­ä»£å™¨
export function* takeEvery(actionType,generator) {
    yield fork(function*() {
        while(true) {
            yield take(actionType);
            yield generator();//increment
        }
    })
}
export function call(fn, ...args) {
    return {
        type: 'CALL',
        fn,
        args
    }
}
const innerDelay = ms => new Promise((reslove, reject) => {
    setTimeout(() => {
        reslove(ms);
    }, ms)
})
export function delay(...args) {
    return call(innerDelay, ...args)
}
export function cps(fn, ...args) {

    return {
        type: 'CPS',
        fn, 
        args
    }
}
export function all(fns) {
    return {
        type: 'ALL',
        fns
    }
}
export function cancel (task) {
   return {
       type:'CANCEL',
       task
   }
}

redux-saga-index.js

import { call } from "./effects";

//è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªä¸­é—´ä»¶
export default function createSagaMiddleware() {

    function createChannel() { //ç®¡é“é€»è¾‘
        let observer = {};
        function subscribe(actionType, callback) {
            console.log(observer, 'oberver');
            observer[actionType] = callback; //è®¢é˜…
            // observer[actionType] = observer[actionType] || [];
            // observer[actionType].push(callback);
        }
        function publish(action) {
            if (observer[action.type]) {
                //å…ˆåˆ å†ç»‘å®š
                console.log('publish');
                let next = observer[action.type];//ä¸Šé¢å­˜çš„å°±æ˜¯nextæŠŠä¸‹æ¬¡è®¢é˜…å®Œæˆæ‰ç»“æŸ
                delete observer[action.type];
                next(action);
                // nexts.forEach(next => next(action));
                // console.log('observer-----', observer)
                //æ­¤å¤„æ˜¯ä¸ªéš¾ç‚¹ ä¸€ç‚¹æ›´è¦ä¿è¯generatoræ‰§è¡Œä¸‹å»
                //
                // observer[action.type](action);
                // delete observer[action.type];
            }
        }
        return {
            subscribe,
            publish
        }
    }
    let channel = createChannel();
    //ä¸­é—´ä»¶
    function sagaMiddleware({ dispatch, getState }) {

        function run(generator, callback) {
            //å¼€å§‹è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰§è¡Œgenerator
            console.log(generator, callback, 'å¼€å§‹è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰§è¡Œgenerator')
           
            let it = typeof generator[Symbol.iterator] == 'function' ? generator : generator();
            // let it = generator();
            function next(action) {
                //value :{type:'TAKE', actionType:ASYNC_INCREMENT}
                console.log('action---', action);
                //action ---  {type: "ASYNC_INCREMENT"}
                let { value: effect, done } = it.next(action);
                console.log('effect---',done, effect)
                //it.next(action); ä¼šæ”¹å˜ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡yiledçš„è¿”å›å€¼ ä¸Šä¸€æ¬¡yieledçš„è¿”å›å€¼å°±æ˜¯action
                //ä»£ç ä¸€è¿è¡Œçš„æ—¶å€™å·²ç»æ‰§è¡Œè¿‡ä¸€æ¬¡äº† ç”¨æˆ·ç‚¹å‡»æŒ‰é’®æ´¾å‘actionçš„æ—¶å€™ å¼€å§‹æ´¾å‘åŠ¨ä½œèµ°äº†pulish ç„¶ååˆèµ°äº†ä¸€éå‘¢next è¿™æ—¶å€™æŠŠè¿”å›å€¼æ”¹æ‰äº†
                //effect ----  {action: {type: "INCREMENT"}, type: "PUT"}
                if (!done) {
                     //yiledçš„å€¼å¯èƒ½å°±æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¿­ä»£å™¨
                    if (typeof effect[Symbol.iterator] == 'function') {
                        run(effect);//å¦‚æœæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªè¿­ä»£å™¨çš„è¯ ç›´æ¥ä¼ å…¥runæ–¹æ³• æ‰§è¡Œ
                        next();
                    } else if (typeof effect.then == 'function') {
                        //ç›´æ¥yeild delay(1000) ä¸€ä¸ªpromise
                        effect.then(next);
                    } else {
                        switch (effect.type) {
                            case 'TAKE'://takeå°±æ˜¯è¦ç›‘å¬æ¯ä¸ªåŠ¨ä½œ,å½“åŠ¨ä½œå‘ç”Ÿæ‰§è¡Œä¸‹ä¸€æ­¥
                                channel.subscribe(effect.actionType, next);
                                break;
                            case 'PUT'://{type:'PUT',action:increment}
                                console.log(dispatch, effect.action);
                                dispatch(effect.action);
                                next();//ç„¶ååˆè¦å»è®¢é˜…
                                break;
                            case 'FORK':
                                let newTask = effect.task(); //taskæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªgenerator
                                run(newTask); //å¦‚æœæ˜¯fork å°±å¼€å¯ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°çš„å­è¿›ç¨‹å»æ‰§è¡Œ
                                next(newTask);//è‡ªå·±çš„sagaä¼šç«‹åˆ»ç»§ç»­æ‰§è¡Œ ä¸ä¼šåœ¨æ­¤ç­‰å¾… ä¼šæ”¹å˜ä¸Šä¸€ä¸ªyieldçš„è¿”å›å€¼
                                //task = yield fork(increment); ä¼šèµ‹å€¼ç»™task
                                break;
                            case 'CANCEL':
                                effect.task.return('ä»»åŠ¡ç›´æ¥ç»“æŸ');//è¿­ä»£å™¨return
                                break;

                            case 'CALL':
                                //å…ˆè®©å‡½æ•°æ‰§è¡Œ
                                effect.fn(...effect.args)
                                    .then(next);
                                //let result = yield call(delay, 1000);
                                //ä¼šæŠŠresolveçš„å€¼reslove(ms) ä¼ ç»™next æ–¹æ³•
                                break;
                            case 'CPS':
                                effect.fn(...effect.args, next);//æŠŠnextang
                                break;
                            case 'ALL':
                                //sagaæ‰§è¡Œå®Œä¹‹å æ‰æ‰§è¡Œnext
                                function times(cb, length) {
                                    let count = 0;
                                    return function () {
                                        if (++count === length) {
                                            cb();
                                        }
                                    }
                                }
                                let fns = effect.fns;
                                let done = times(next, fns.length);
                                effect.fns.forEach(fn => run(fn, done));
                                break;
                            default:
                                break;
                        }
                    }

                } else {
                    //sagaå®Œæˆ -- æ‰§è¡Œnext  
                    callback && callback()
                }
            }
            next();
        }
        sagaMiddleware.run = run;
        return next => action => {
            channel.publish(action);//æ´¾å‘åŠ¨ä½œ
            next(action)
        }
    }
    return sagaMiddleware;
}

useReducer

const initialState = 0;
function reducer(state, action) {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'ADD':
      return { number: state.number + 1 };
    default:
      return state;
      break;
  }
}
function Counter() {
  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, initialState, () => ({ number: initialState }))
  return (
    <p>{state.number}</p>
      <button onClick={() => dispatch({ type: 'ADD' })}>+</button>
  )
}

      <Subcounter />
    </Countercontext.Provider>

  )
}
function Subcounter() {
  const {state, dispatch} = useContext(Countercontext); //å¯ä»¥è§£æ„
  return (
    <>
      <p>{state.number}</p>
      <button onClick={() => dispatch({ type: 'ADD' })}>+</button>

    </>

  )
}

import React, {createRef, forwardRef,useRef, useState, useEffect, useReducer, createContext, Component, useContext,useImperativeHandle } from 'react';
import ReactDOM from 'react-dom';

function Child(props, parentRef) {
  let inputRef = useRef();
  useImperativeHandle(parentRef, () => {
    return {
      focus() { //è¿™ä¸ªæ–¹æ³•ä¼šä¼ ç»™parentRefã€‚current
        inputRef.current.focus();
      }
    }
  });
  return (
    <>
    <input type="text" ref={inputRef}/>
    </>
  )
}
//è¿™æ ·å†™ å­ç»„ä»¶æ”¶ä¸åˆ°ä¿æŠ¤
let ForwardChild = forwardRef(Child);

function Parent() {
  //æ“ä½œchild çš„input 
  let [number, setNumber] = useState(0);
  const parentRef = useRef();
  function getFocus() {
    parentRef.current.focus();
    //æ­¤å¤„çš„currentæ˜¯ä¸Šé¢useImperativeHandle returnçš„é‚£ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡å‘€
  }
  return (
    <>
    <ForwardChild ref={parentRef}/>
    <button onClick={getFocus}>è·å¾—ç„¦ç‚¹</button>
    <button onClick={()=>setNumber(number+1)}>{number}</button>
    </>
  )
}

import React, { useLayoutEffect, useEffect, useState} from 'react';

function UseLayoutEffectComponent() {
   const [color, setcolor] = useState('red');
      //useLayoutEffect
   //ä¼šåœ¨æ‰€æœ‰çš„DOMå˜æ›´ä¹‹ååŒæ­¥è°ƒç”¨effect
   //å¯ä»¥ç”¨ä»–æ¥è¯»å–DOMå¸ƒå±€å¹¶åŒæ­¥è§¦å‘é‡æ¸²æŸ“

   //å°½å¯èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨æ ‡å‡†çš„useEffect ä»¥é¿å…é˜»å¡è§†å›¾æ›´æ–°
   useLayoutEffect(() => {

    console.log('useLayoutEffect-COLOR==', color); 
    document.getElementById('myDiv').style.backgroundColor='pink'//é¡µé¢æ°¸è¿œæ˜¯pink

     <>
